entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
